data.title: Vietnam War Marine Helicopters based at Phu Bai
data.text:
Marine Helicopters based at Phu Bai information

for HMM-162

MAG-16

For date 650415

HMM-162 was a US Marine Corps unit

MAG-16 was a US Marine Corps unit

Primary service involved, US Marine Corps

Thua Thien Province, I Corps, South Vietnam

Location, Phu Bai

Description: MAG-16 positioned 10 UH-34D's, primarily from HMM-162, at Phu Bai to support the expanding Marine activities at this enclave. While Marine helicopters had certainly uses this airfield before, this is the first record of a permanent guarison here.

The source for this information was USMC H 1965: P27

Additional information is available on CD-ROM.

Please send additions or corrections to: Gary Roush Email address: webmaster@vhpa.org
